niche: Manufacturer of Automated Poultry Farming Equipment
description: Zhengzhou Livi Machinery Manufacturing CO.,LTD. designs, manufactures, and supplies fully automated poultry cage systems and related equipment for large-scale chicken farms.

niche: Food and Beverage Industry Market Intelligence and News
description: EssFeed provides essential news, market reports, and professional tools for the global food and beverage industry, including market indices, contact directories, and premium research.

IntechOpen is an Open Access publisher that makes scientific research freely available and easy to access for scientists worldwide, prioritizing academic needs over commercial interests.
